original: des na de'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: des na de'i rgyu can du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not the effect of that‚Äù is the effect of the proof.

original: gal te 'di snyam du me yongs su spangs nas gzhan du skye ba de lta na yang gzhan gyi rgyu can du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du me yongs su spangs nas gzhan du skye ba de lta na yang gzhan gyi rgyu can du 'gyur gyi /
translated: If you think that even if fire arises from another, having abandoned the fuel, it would be the effect of another,

original: rgyu med pa can ni ma yin no snyam na ma yin te zhes smos te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa can ni ma yin no snyam na ma yin te zhes smos te /
translated: but not without a cause, then no, it is not so.

original: rgyu'i tshogs pa gzhan yin pa de la yang 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid du thal ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs pa gzhan yin pa de la yang 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid du thal ba mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the consequence that the collection of causes that is other is not the effect is the same.

original: 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid ston pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu'i tshogs de med kyang me yod na 'byung ba'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid ston pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu'i tshogs de med kyang me yod na 'byung ba'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin no //
translated: To show that it is not the effect, it is said, ‚ÄúBecause it arises even when the collection of causes that is desired does not exist, if fire exists, it is not the effect of that.‚Äù

original: de ltar mi dang gzhan las kyang 'byung bar khas blangs te rgyu med pa nyid du bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar mi dang gzhan las kyang 'byung bar khas blangs te rgyu med pa nyid du bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having accepted that it arises from another, it is taught that it is without a cause.

original: da ni yang na zhes bya ba sogs pas gzhan las 'byung ba ni me las skye ba ma yin la /
analyzed: da ni yang na zhes bya ba sogs pas gzhan las 'byung ba ni me las skye ba ma yin la /
translated: Now, the line ‚ÄúIf it arises from another, it does not arise from fire‚Äù and so on.

original: me las 'byung ba ni gzhan las skye ba ma yin par bstan pas rgyu med pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: me las 'byung ba ni gzhan las skye ba ma yin par bstan pas rgyu med pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: Since it is taught that fire does not arise from another, it is taught that it is causeless.

original: me de'am dngos po gzhan gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: me de'am dngos po gzhan gang yang rung ste /
translated: Whether it is that fire or some other thing,

original: de bskyed pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bskyed pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: how could it arise from that which is not of the nature to produce it?

original: du ba me las skye bar mthong ba na ni rgyu'i tshogs pa gzhan de'i skyed par byed pa ma yin te /üîΩrgyu rnams kyi nus pa so sor @258a * //
analyzed: du ba me las skye bar mthong ba na ni rgyu'i tshogs pa gzhan de'i skyed par byed pa ma yin te / rgyu rnams kyi nus pa so sor @258a * //
translated: When smoke is seen to arise from fire, it is not produced by another collection of causes,

original: nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the power of causes is ascertained individually.

original: de bzhin du du ba gzhan las skye na ni me de skye ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du du ba gzhan las skye na ni me de skye ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa shes te /
translated: In the same way, if smoke arises from another, that fire is not of the nature to produce it.

original: des na du ba bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gnyi ga las du ba skye ba ma yin pa dang / 'di skye bar yang snang ba de'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na du ba bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gnyi ga las du ba skye ba ma yin pa dang / 'di skye bar yang snang ba de'i phyir rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since smoke does not arise from both that which is not of the nature to produce smoke and that which is not of the nature to produce fire, and since it appears to arise from those two, it would be causeless.

original: de nyid ston pa ni rang gis de bdag nyid kyis skyed par byed pa de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa ni de skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni rang gis de bdag nyid kyis skyed par byed pa de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa ni de skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: That itself is taught because that which is not the nature of that which generates itself does not generate it.üîΩ

original: rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The response to that is: That which is not of the nature of that which generates itself does not generate it, because it is not a cause.

original: gal te rang nyid skyed par byed pa ma yin yang 'bras bu skyed na ni thams cad kyis skyed pa'i phyir 'ga' yang gang las kyang mi skye ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid skyed par byed pa ma yin yang 'bras bu skyed na ni thams cad kyis skyed pa'i phyir 'ga' yang gang las kyang mi skye ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If something does not generate itself but generates an effect, then everything would generate everything, because nothing would generate anything.

original: des na thams cad la thams cad skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid la skyon gang 'gyur ba de 'di la 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na thams cad la thams cad skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid la skyon gang 'gyur ba de 'di la 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the error of causelessness would ensue.

original: cig shos kyis skyon spang pa'i phyir smra pa /üîΩme las skye bar mthong ba'i du ba de nyid las gzhan las sam /
analyzed: cig shos kyis skyon spang pa'i phyir smra pa / me las skye bar mthong ba'i du ba de nyid las gzhan las sam /
translated: The other responds to rebut that error:

original: gzhan gyi rgyu can yang me las 'byung ngo zhes su zer /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyu can yang me las 'byung ngo zhes su zer /
translated: Who says that smoke that is seen arising from fire arises from that fire or from something else?üîΩOr that it has a cause that is different from fire?

original: 'o na de ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is it?

original: smras pa / dngos po gang zhig me las skye ba de dang 'dra ba gzhan las 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: smras pa / dngos po gang zhig me las skye ba de dang 'dra ba gzhan las 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Objection: Because a thing arises from fire, it arises from another thing that is similar to it.

original: cig shos kyis smras pa /
analyzed: cig shos kyis smras pa /
translated: The other says:

original: me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang mi mthun pa mi 'dra ba'i rgyu tshogs las byung ba'i 'bras bu ji ltar de dang 'dra ba yin te ;
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang mi mthun pa mi 'dra ba'i rgyu tshogs las byung ba'i 'bras bu ji ltar de dang 'dra ba yin te ;
translated: How could the effect that arises from a collection of causes that is dissimilar to a collection of causes such as fire be similar to that?

original: 'dra ba nyid ni don gcig byed par nus pa can rnams kyi khyad par can gyi don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang / rnam ba gcig tu 'dzin pa skyed par nus pas byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni don gcig byed par nus pa can rnams kyi khyad par can gyi don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang / rnam ba gcig tu 'dzin pa skyed par nus pas byas pa yin no //
translated: Similarity is the basis for the activity of a single object, it is the basis for the activity of a particular object, and it is the basis for the capacity to apprehend a single aspect.

original: rgyu'i tshogs tha dad pa las skye pa ni rang bzhin mi 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bar rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs tha dad pa las skye pa ni rang bzhin mi 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bar rigs pa yin te /
translated: It is reasonable that what arises from a collection of causes that is different would be intrinsically dissimilar.

original: dper na s'a lu'i sa bon dang nas kyi sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa las myu gu mi 'dra ba nyid yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na s'a lu'i sa bon dang nas kyi sa bon la sogs pa'i tshogs pa las myu gu mi 'dra ba nyid yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a sprout is intrinsically dissimilar from a collection of rice, barley, and so on.

original: 'di nyid ston pa ni de dang 'dra ba las byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa ni de dang 'dra ba las byung ba'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: and the effect is similar to the cause because it arises from a cause that is similar to it.

original: gal te mthong ba'i rnam pa'i rgyu'i tshogs dang mi 'dra ba'i rgyu'i tshogs pa dag las de dang 'dra ba 'byung na ni /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba'i rnam pa'i rgyu'i tshogs dang mi 'dra ba'i rgyu'i tshogs pa dag las de dang 'dra ba 'byung na ni /
translated: If a cause that is not similar to the effect were to produce an effect that is similar to it,

original: rgyu de dag gi nus pa nges pa de med pas rgyu'i tha dad pa 'bras bu tha dad par byed pa ma yin no //üîΩ'bras bu dag ni phan tshun rigs mi mthun pa dang 'ga' zhig ni rigs mthun par yang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu de dag gi nus pa nges pa de med pas rgyu'i tha dad pa 'bras bu tha dad par byed pa ma yin no // 'bras bu dag ni phan tshun rigs mi mthun pa dang 'ga' zhig ni rigs mthun par yang mthong ba yin no //
translated: then the power of the cause would not be restricted to producing a particular effect, and the difference in causes would not account for the difference in effects.üîΩWe see that some effects are dissimilar to each other and some are similar to each other.

original: de las tha dad par 'dra ba las 'ga' zhig dang 'dra @258b ba dang 'ga' zhig ni mi 'dra bar mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: de las tha dad par 'dra ba las 'ga' zhig dang 'dra @258b ba dang 'ga' zhig ni mi 'dra bar mthong ba yin la /
translated: We see that some effects are similar to their cause and some are not.

original: gcig cig 'ga' zhig dang 'dra ba dang 'ga' zhig dang mi 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan med pa can yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig cig 'ga' zhig dang 'dra ba dang 'ga' zhig dang mi 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan med pa can yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not without reason that one effect is similar to its cause and another is not.

original: 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba las ma gtogs ba'i dngos po'i ngo bo 'ga' zhig yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba las ma gtogs ba'i dngos po'i ngo bo 'ga' zhig yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And apart from the similar and the dissimilar, there is no nature of a thing.

original: des na dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu gang yin pa de nyid 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: des na dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu gang yin pa de nyid 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, whatever is the cause of the nature of a thing is also the cause of the similar and the dissimilar.

original: de lta na yang rgyu tha dad pa can gyi nas kyi myu gu dang / s'a lu'i myu gu dag ni nus pa tha dad pa dang / rnam pa tha dad par gzung bar bya ba rang bzhin tha dad ba yin la /
analyzed: de lta na yang rgyu tha dad pa can gyi nas kyi myu gu dang / s'a lu'i myu gu dag ni nus pa tha dad pa dang / rnam pa tha dad par gzung bar bya ba rang bzhin tha dad ba yin la /
translated: Even so, the barley sprout and the rice sprout, which have different causes, are apprehended as having different potencies and different aspects, and so they have different natures.

original: rgyu mtshungs pa can s'a lu'i myu gu dag ni don gcig byed par nus pa dang / rnam pa gcig tu gzung bar bya ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshungs pa can s'a lu'i myu gu dag ni don gcig byed par nus pa dang / rnam pa gcig tu gzung bar bya ba'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: But the rice sprouts, which have the same cause, are apprehended as having the same potency to produce the same effect and as having the same aspect, and so they have the same nature.

original: gang gi tshe rgyu tha dad pa dang 'brel kyang cig shos dang mtshungs na ni de'i tshe cig shos de'i gzhan las tha dad pa de ni rgyu med pa can nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rgyu tha dad pa dang 'brel kyang cig shos dang mtshungs na ni de'i tshe cig shos de'i gzhan las tha dad pa de ni rgyu med pa can nyid do //
translated: But if, even though they are related to different causes, they are the same as the other, then the other, which is different from the other, would be without a cause.

original: rang bzhin gzhan yang med pa'i phyir thams cad du rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan yang med pa'i phyir thams cad du rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: And because there is no other intrinsic reality, everything would be causeless.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba mtha' dag gi sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgyu med pa la yang yul dang dus dang rang bzhin nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes nyes pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba mtha' dag gi sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgyu med pa la yang yul dang dus dang rang bzhin nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes nyes pa bshad zin to //
translated: And in that regard, it has already been explained that the diversity of everything is not tenable without a cause, because spatial and temporal restrictions and the regularity of cause and effect would be untenable.

original: thams cad thams cad las skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni skyon gzhan yin te gang gi tshe rgyu rnams kyi nus pa ma nges pa de'i tshe bskyed par bya ba yin pa nyid kyis thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad
analyzed: thams cad thams cad las skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni skyon gzhan yin te gang gi tshe rgyu rnams kyi nus pa ma nges pa de'i tshe bskyed par bya ba yin pa nyid kyis thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad
translated: This is another fault: Everything would arise from everything, because if the power of causes is not restricted, then everything would be the cause of everything, because everything would be the effect of everything.

original: las skyed par byed pa yin ba'i phyir thams cad las skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las skyed par byed pa yin ba'i phyir thams cad las skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And because everything would be the cause of everything, everything would arise from everything.

original: de'i phyir ji srid du 'gro ba na dngos po gcig gnas pa de srid du de'i 'bras bu skye ba ldog pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji srid du 'gro ba na dngos po gcig gnas pa de srid du de'i 'bras bu skye ba ldog pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: And therefore, as long as a thing persists while moving, its effect would arise without interruption.

original: de'i phyir 'di gnyi ga las skyen gcig la 'khrul pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di gnyi ga las skyen gcig la 'khrul pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since both are mistaken with regard to a single thing,

original: rgyu med pa nyid dam tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag rgyu med pa'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid dam tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag rgyu med pa'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: it is causeless, because a difference or nondifference that is causeless is causeless.

original: thams cad thams cad las skye bar thal ba ni rgyu med pa'i skabs nyid yin te /
analyzed: thams cad thams cad las skye bar thal ba ni rgyu med pa'i skabs nyid yin te /
translated: The consequence that everything would arise from everything else is the context of causelessness.

original: rgyu med na ni thams cad la thams cad yod par thal zhing /üîΩthams cad rgyu yin pa nyid la yang thal ba'i 'di khyad par med pas rgyu med pa nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu med na ni thams cad la thams cad yod par thal zhing / thams cad rgyu yin pa nyid la yang thal ba'i 'di khyad par med pas rgyu med pa nyid do //
translated: If there is no cause, it follows that everything would exist in everything,üîΩand the consequence that everything would be a cause is also the same, so it is causeless.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar thams cad las skye bar thal ba de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa las /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar thams cad las skye bar thal ba de'i phyir rgyu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin pa las /
translated: Because of the consequence that everything would arise from everything,

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa dang tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: the effect would be different or nondifferent from the cause that is different or nondifferent.üîΩTherefore smoke does not arise from a dissimilar object that is seen,

original: de'i phyir du ba ni mthong ba'i rnam pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i don las mi 'byung gi / gang @259a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir du ba ni mthong ba'i rnam pa dang rigs mi mthun pa'i don las mi 'byung gi / gang @259a * //
translated: but it arises from a similar object that is not seen.

original: las skye bar mthong ba de kho na las 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: las skye bar mthong ba de kho na las 'byung ba yin te /
translated: That which is seen to arise from karma arises from that alone.

original: de lta ma yin na ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, it would follow that it is causeless.

original: rgyu med pa nyid yin na yang dngos po rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid yin na yang dngos po rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur te /
translated: If it were causeless, it would be either always existent or always nonexistent,

original: dngos po rgyu med pa ni don gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po rgyu med pa ni don gzhan la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a thing that is without a cause does not depend on another thing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: res 'ga' 'byung ba ni 'bras bu'i yul nyid du ltos pa las yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: res 'ga' 'byung ba ni 'bras bu'i yul nyid du ltos pa las yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the occurrence of an effect is dependent on the object of the effect.

original: 'di nyid rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir du ba de zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir du ba de zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate just this, he says, ‚ÄúIf smoke were to arise from that which is not smoke. . . . ‚Äù

original: du brgya med pa las byung na ni ges 'ga' bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: du brgya med pa las byung na ni ges 'ga' bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it were to arise from that which is not smoke, it would not occur sometimes,

original: de 'byung ba la ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'byung ba la ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no incompleteness in the arising of that.

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i dus so //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i dus so //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen it is desired‚Äù means when it exists.

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i dus su yang ngo //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i dus su yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúEven then‚Äù means even when it exists.

original: de yod pa'i dus ni de bskyed par bya ba la med pa'i dus dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod pa'i dus ni de bskyed par bya ba la med pa'i dus dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference between the time when it exists and the time when it does not exist in order to generate it.

original: 'di snyam du gal te dngos po rgyu la mi ltos kyang res 'ga' bar 'gyur ba ci 'gal zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te dngos po rgyu la mi ltos kyang res 'ga' bar 'gyur ba ci 'gal zhe na /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúWhat contradiction is there in the fact that sometimes things do not rely on causes?‚Äù

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa rnams ni zhes smos so //
translated: The root text says, ‚ÄúThings that rely on . . .‚Äù

original: res 'ga'i dngos po ni res 'ga' ba'o //
analyzed: res 'ga'i dngos po ni res 'ga' ba'o //
translated: The state of being sometimes is the state of being sometimes.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: yul de la ltos pa las rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: yul de la ltos pa las rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med do //
translated: It is not the case that there is a reason for something‚Äôs existence other than its reliance on that object.

original: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi rgyu zhes bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang /üîΩgang gi phyir de yod na 'bras bu yod la /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi rgyu zhes bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang / gang gi phyir de yod na 'bras bu yod la /
translated: That which is asserted to be the cause of somethingüîΩis a cause because the effect exists when it exists and does not exist when it does not exist.üîΩTherefore, it is a cause that is characterized by the state of being dependent on the existence and nonexistence of the effect.

original: med na med pas na de yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ltos pas rgyur 'gyur ba yin la de ni 'bras bu'i dus la yang khyad par med de /
analyzed: med na med pas na de yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ltos pas rgyur 'gyur ba yin la de ni 'bras bu'i dus la yang khyad par med de /
translated: But that does not differ in the time of the effect.

original: des na dus ni rgyu yin no zhes gang bshad pa ni /
analyzed: des na dus ni rgyu yin no zhes gang bshad pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the time of the effect is the cause.

original: yod pa dang med pa'i dus te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i dus te /
translated: The time of the effect is the time of existence and the time of nonexistence.

original: dus de dag tu don de 'byung bar rung ba dang mi rung ba gang yin pa de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus de dag tu don de 'byung bar rung ba dang mi rung ba gang yin pa de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible or impossible for that effect to occur at those times.

original: yod pa'i dus su ni de skyed par rung ba dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: yod pa'i dus su ni de skyed par rung ba dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: At the time when it exists, it is possible for it to be produced.

original: med pa'i dus na ni de skyed par mi rung ba dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: med pa'i dus na ni de skyed par mi rung ba dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: At the time when it does not exist, it is impossible for it to be produced.

original: des na res 'ga' ba yin la /
analyzed: des na res 'ga' ba yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is intermittent.

original: res 'ga' ba yin na yang ltos pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ba yin na yang ltos pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: And if it is intermittent, it must be dependent.

original: ji ltar na yod pa dang med pa'i dus de dag rung ba dang mi rung ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na yod pa dang med pa'i dus de dag rung ba dang mi rung ba yin zhe na /
translated: How can those times when it exists or does not exist be possible or impossible?

original: yul dang dus rung ba dang mi rung ba 'dra ba can zhes smos te /
analyzed: yul dang dus rung ba dang mi rung ba 'dra ba can zhes smos te /
translated: The text says, ‚Äúbecause the object and time are similar in being possible or impossible.‚Äù

original: gal te yod pa dang med pa'i yul dang dus dag 'dra bar rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid du 'dod na /üîΩde lta na ni de'i yul dang dus zhig de dang ldan pa 'bras bu dang ldan pa'am /
analyzed: gal te yod pa dang med pa'i yul dang dus dag 'dra bar rung ba dang mi rung ba nyid du 'dod na / de lta na ni de'i yul dang dus zhig de dang ldan pa 'bras bu dang ldan pa'am /
translated: If it is accepted that the object and time of an existent or nonexistent effect are similar in being possible or impossible,

original: cig shos te de dang mi ldan pa de dag tu nges pa mi 'thad do //
analyzed: cig shos te de dang mi ldan pa de dag tu nges pa mi 'thad do //
translated: then it is not tenable that the object and time of that effect are definite in either possessing or not possessing the effect.

original: rung ba dang mi rung bar khyad par med na ni thams cad de dang ldan pa'am de dang mi ldan par @259b 'gyur gyi yul dang dus 'ga' zhig ni de dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: rung ba dang mi rung bar khyad par med na ni thams cad de dang ldan pa'am de dang mi ldan par @259b 'gyur gyi yul dang dus 'ga' zhig ni de dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: If there were no difference between what is suitable and what is not suitable, then everything would either be suitable or not suitable.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i nges pa 'dir ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i nges pa 'dir ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This certainty that ‚Äúin some places and times it is suitable, but not in others‚Äù would not exist.

original: de ltar mi 'thad pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar mi 'thad pa yin te /
translated: This is not tenable.

original: mi rung ba de'i phyir gang na dngos po 'gyur ba'i yul dang dus de ni dngos po'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: mi rung ba de'i phyir gang na dngos po 'gyur ba'i yul dang dus de ni dngos po'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Because of that, the place and time where things change is the cause of things.

original: gang du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni mi rung ba nyid kyi rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du mi 'gyur ba de dag ni mi rung ba nyid kyi rgyu ma yin no //
translated: That which does not change is not the cause of what is not suitable.

original: rung ba nyid de yang rgyu'i dngos po las gzhan pa'i don ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rung ba nyid de yang rgyu'i dngos po las gzhan pa'i don ni ma yin gyi /
translated: That very suitability is not a different object from the state of being a cause.

original: 'on kyang rgyu'i dngos po nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu'i dngos po nyid do //
translated: Rather, it is the state of being a cause itself.

original: dus ni 'du byed dag las gzhan ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dus ni 'du byed dag las gzhan ma yin gyi /
translated: Time is not different from formations.

original: 'on kyang don de skye ba'i rgyu grang ba'i reg pa la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab thams cad du khyab pa ni dgun la sogs pa'i tha snyad brten pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang don de skye ba'i rgyu grang ba'i reg pa la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab thams cad du khyab pa ni dgun la sogs pa'i tha snyad brten pa yin no //
translated: But the cause of the arising of that effect is the atoms of cold contact, etc., which are all-pervasive, and the convention ‚Äúwinter‚Äù is based on them.

original: de'i phyir ltos par bya ba'i yul dang dus kyi khyad par gang yin pa de nyid rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ltos par bya ba'i yul dang dus kyi khyad par gang yin pa de nyid rgyu yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cause is the particular object and time that are relied upon.

original: de'i phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas yul dang dus gzhan dag na yod pa'i dngos po yul dang dus de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pas de'i rgyu can yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas yul dang dus gzhan dag na yod pa'i dngos po yul dang dus de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pas de'i rgyu can yin te /
translated: Thus, having excluded some object and time, the entity that exists in other objects and times is the cause of that object and time because it conforms with the presence and absence of that object and time.

original: de lta na ltos pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ltos pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: In that case, it is related.

original: gal te yul dang dus nges su chug mod /
analyzed: gal te yul dang dus nges su chug mod /
translated: Granted that the object and time are restricted,üîΩbut how is it related?

original: de lta na yang ltos pa dang bcas pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar zhes smos so chug mod /
analyzed: de lta na yang ltos pa dang bcas pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / 'di ltar zhes smos so chug mod /
translated: In that case, it is related.üîΩGranted that the object and time are restricted,üîΩbut how is it related?

original: de lta na yang ltos pa dang bcas par ji ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar zhes smos so //
analyzed: de lta na yang ltos pa dang bcas par ji ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar zhes smos so //
translated: In that case, it is related.

original: gang gi phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yul dang dus 'ga' zhig spangs nas /
translated: Because, having abandoned some place and time,

original: yul dang dus 'ga' zhig na yod pa nyid ni ltos par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yul dang dus 'ga' zhig na yod pa nyid ni ltos par brjod pa yin no //
translated: existence at some place and time is called dependence.

original: gal te ltos pa phan 'dogs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ltos pa phan 'dogs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If dependence is not helpful?

original: bden te / 'di la yang yul dang bcas par kho na ste /
analyzed: bden te / 'di la yang yul dang bcas par kho na ste /
translated: It is true, but here it is only with respect to place,

original: yul dang dus de dag gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi ltos pa ni yul dang dus der yod par nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: yul dang dus de dag gis byas pa'i phan pa la mi ltos pa ni yul dang dus der yod par nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: because it is not tenable that something is ascertained to exist at a particular place and time without depending on the help provided by those places and times.

original: /'di ltar de las rang bzhin gyi khyad par ma skyes pa ni /
analyzed: /'di ltar de las rang bzhin gyi khyad par ma skyes pa ni /
translated: Thus, a particular nature that has not arisen from that

original: rang gi ngo bos yul lam dus 'ga' zhig tu yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos yul lam dus 'ga' zhig tu yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: does not exist in any place or time by its own nature.

original: 'byung ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir na thams cad du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir na thams cad du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it has the property of arising, it will arise everywhere.

original: la lar 'gyur ba ni yul dang dus de dag gis rang bzhin gyi khyad par skyed pa yin pas /
analyzed: la lar 'gyur ba ni yul dang dus de dag gis rang bzhin gyi khyad par skyed pa yin pas /
translated: But it arises in some places, because those places and times produce a particular nature.

original: skyed par byed pa la rgyu'i dngos por ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa la rgyu'i dngos por ltos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the producer is regarded as the cause.

original: khyad par ltos pa gang yin pa de nyid ni rgyu yin la /
analyzed: khyad par ltos pa gang yin pa de nyid ni rgyu yin la /
translated: That which is the specific dependence is the cause.

original: rgyu dang ldan pa'i chos yul dang dus nges pa nyid gang yin pa de ni du ba la yang yod de /
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan pa'i chos yul dang dus nges pa nyid gang yin pa de ni du ba la yang yod de /
translated: That which is the dharma possessing a cause, which is ascertained as to place and time, exists in smoke.

original: de'i phyir du ba ni rgyu dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir du ba ni rgyu dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, smoke possesses a cause.

original: @260a * // rgyu dang ldan par shes pa na yang yul dus dang ldan pa'i rdzas yod pa gang du du ba bskyed par mthong la /
analyzed: @260a * // rgyu dang ldan par shes pa na yang yul dus dang ldan pa'i rdzas yod pa gang du du ba bskyed par mthong la /
translated: When one knows that it possesses a cause, one sees that the existent substance possessing place and time generates smoke.

original: de med na ma mthong ba ni me de skyed par byed pa nyid du ltos pa'i phyir 'di'i nges pa bskyed par bya ba de'i rgyu can gyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: de med na ma mthong ba ni me de skyed par byed pa nyid du ltos pa'i phyir 'di'i nges pa bskyed par bya ba de'i rgyu can gyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: When that is absent, one does not see it. Since one sees that fire is the cause of its generation, one ascertains that its nature is caused by that which generates it.

original: gzhan du na des bskyed par bya ba nyid ma yin na ni lan 'ga' ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na des bskyed par bya ba nyid ma yin na ni lan 'ga' ste /
translated: Otherwise, if it were not to be generated by that, it would not be generated even once.

original: phyogs gcig kyang skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i me de las med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phyogs gcig kyang skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i me de las med pa'i phyir te /
translated: It would not be generated even partially, because there would be no fire that is not a generator.

original: chu las bzhin no //
analyzed: chu las bzhin no //
translated: It would be like water.

original: 'byung ba 'ang yin te de'i phyi me der nges pa yin na /
analyzed: 'byung ba 'ang yin te de'i phyi me der nges pa yin na /
translated: If it were an element, it would be ascertained as that fire.

original: ji ltar gzhan las 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan las 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: How could it arise from another?

original: 'byung na ni de du ba la ma yin te /
analyzed: 'byung na ni de du ba la ma yin te /
translated: If it did arise, then it would not be smoke,

original: 'on kyang dngos po gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang dngos po gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: but rather would be something else.

original: gang gi phyir me nge bskyed pa'i don ni 'jig rten na du ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir me nge bskyed pa'i don ni 'jig rten na du ba zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Because in the world, smoke is said to be generated by fire.

original: ji ltar mes bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du ba yin pa de bzhin du rgyu yang 'bras bu de lta bu skyed pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mes bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du ba yin pa de bzhin du rgyu yang 'bras bu de lta bu skyed pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o //
translated: Just as smoke has the nature of being generated by fire, so too a cause has the nature of generating an effect of that kind.

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What follows from this?

original: des na 'bras bu ba de gzhan las zhes bya ba mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu tshogs pa las gzhan me ma yin pa la sogs pa de las kyang 'byung na ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu tshogs pa de du ba skyed pa de'i rang bzhin ma yin no
analyzed: des na 'bras bu ba de gzhan las zhes bya ba mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu tshogs pa las gzhan me ma yin pa la sogs pa de las kyang 'byung na ni mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu tshogs pa de du ba skyed pa de'i rang bzhin ma yin no
translated: Therefore, if that effect, smoke, arises from something other than the desired collection of causes, from something that is not fire, etc., then the desired collection of causes is not the nature of the generator of that smoke.

original: // yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su nges pas ltos par bya ba ni 'bras bu'i skyed par byed par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: // yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su nges pas ltos par bya ba ni 'bras bu'i skyed par byed par brjod pa yin no //
translated: That which is to be relied upon is said to be the generator of the effect, because of the ascertainment of the existence and nonexistence.

original: rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di ni du bas ltos par bya ba ma yin pas skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs pa 'di ni du bas ltos par bya ba ma yin pas skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: This collection of causes is not dependent on smoke, and so it is not a producer.

original: des na lan 'ga' yang skyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na lan 'ga' yang skyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it never produces smoke.

original: yang na me las gzhan des skyed pa de du ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na me las gzhan des skyed pa de du ba ma yin te /
translated: Or, that which is produced from something other than fire is not smoke,

original: du ba skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ba skyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it arises from that which is not the nature of producing smoke.

original: gal te bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te bskyed pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is not the nature of producing smoke,

original: de las kyang du ba skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de las kyang du ba skye ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because smoke arises from that,

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni du ba skyed pa'i rang bzhin nyid du khas len na ni de nyid me yin no //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni du ba skyed pa'i rang bzhin nyid du khas len na ni de nyid me yin no //
translated: if you accept that it is the nature of producing smoke, then that itself is fire.

original: gal te du ba'i skyed par byad pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: gal te du ba'i skyed par byad pa ni gnyis te /
translated: If the producer of smoke is twofold,

original: me la sogs pa'i tshogs dang mngon par 'dod pa gzhan yin te /
analyzed: me la sogs pa'i tshogs dang mngon par 'dod pa gzhan yin te /
translated: the collection of fire and so on and another that is manifestly desired,

original: des na skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur zhing thams cad las skye ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: des na skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de ni ma yin no zhes bya bar mi 'gyur zhing thams cad las skye ba yang ma yin te /
translated: then it is not the case that that which is a producer is not that, and it is not the case that everything is produced from everything.

original: gnyis nyid skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis nyid skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it has the nature of producing both.

original: 'di la bsam pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di la bsam pa 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: du ba'i gzhan las tha dad pa ni rgyu med pa 'am /
analyzed: du ba'i gzhan las tha dad pa ni rgyu med pa 'am /
translated: The difference of smoke from other things is not causeless,

original: gzhan gyi rgyu can ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyu can ni ma yin gyi /
translated: nor is it caused by something else.

original: 'on kyang rgyu tha dad pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu tha dad pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin no //
translated: But it is preceded by a different cause.

original: de la @260b mthong ba dang rigs mi mthun pa las kyang rkyen ni rgyu tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la @260b mthong ba dang rigs mi mthun pa las kyang rkyen ni rgyu tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And in that case, even though the condition is different from what is seen, it is not a different cause.

original: de nyid kyi phyir tha mi dad pa las kyang tha mi dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tha mi dad pa las kyang tha mi dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: And for that very reason, even though it is not different from what is not different, it is causeless.

original: des na 'bras bu rgyu dang ldan par khas len pas rgyu tha dad pa las tha dad par khas len blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na 'bras bu rgyu dang ldan par khas len pas rgyu tha dad pa las tha dad par khas len blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since we accept that the effect has a cause, we should accept that it is different from what is different.

original: des na me las skye bar mthong ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'dra ba'i skyed par byed pa ni me kho na yin pas du ba me las 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: des na me las skye bar mthong ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de 'dra ba'i skyed par byed pa ni me kho na yin pas du ba me las 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since the nature that is seen to arise from fire is produced by fire alone, smoke is not confused about fire.

original: gal te mes bskyed par bya ba nyid du ba yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te mes bskyed par bya ba nyid du ba yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it uncertain that smoke is produced by fire?

original: sgra rang 'dod kyis sbyor ba na gzhan yang du bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sgra rang 'dod kyis sbyor ba na gzhan yang du bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: When sound is applied by desire, it is also applied to other things.

original: gzhan la yang du bar brjod la ni rag na /
analyzed: gzhan la yang du bar brjod la ni rag na /
translated: But even if it is applied to other things,

original: de dag las gang zhig mes bskyed pa'i du ba de ni gzhan las ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dag las gang zhig mes bskyed pa'i du ba de ni gzhan las ma yin pa'i phyir nges pa nyid do //
translated: it is certain that smoke is produced by fire, because it is not produced by anything else.

original: da lta ni 'jig rten na mgrin pa dgu ba la sogs pa'i don gcig byed pa nyid kyi rnam pa gcig tu zhen par rung ba'i don la ngu ba'i sgra 'jug cing /
analyzed: da lta ni 'jig rten na mgrin pa dgu ba la sogs pa'i don gcig byed pa nyid kyi rnam pa gcig tu zhen par rung ba'i don la ngu ba'i sgra 'jug cing /
translated: Now, in the world, the word ‚Äúsmoke‚Äù is applied to an object that is suitable to be conceived as having a single aspect, the performance of a single function, such as having nine necks.

original: du ba de yang khyad par can gyi don byed pa rnam pa gcig tu shes pa'i yul gyi don la nges pa'i phyir mes ba skyed ba nyid yin gyi du ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ba de yang khyad par can gyi don byed pa rnam pa gcig tu shes pa'i yul gyi don la nges pa'i phyir mes ba skyed ba nyid yin gyi du ba'i sgras brjod par bya ba nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: And that smoke is ascertained in terms of the object that is the object of knowledge of a single aspect, the performance of a special function. Therefore, it is produced by fire, but it is not the object expressed by the word ‚Äúsmoke.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du bud shing 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid kyis rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa'i gzung bar bya ba'i me ni du ba'i skyed byed du mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bud shing 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyid kyis rnam pa gcig tu 'dzin pa'i gzung bar bya ba'i me ni du ba'i skyed byed du mthong ba yin te /
translated: Likewise, the fire that is the object of the apprehension of a single aspect by the cause of the transformation of fuel is seen to be the producer of smoke.

original: de'i phyir sreg pa'i rnam par zhen par rung ba dang / 'brel pa du ba'i rnam par 'dzin par rung ba'i don yin no zhes brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sreg pa'i rnam par zhen par rung ba dang / 'brel pa du ba'i rnam par 'dzin par rung ba'i don yin no zhes brjod pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is suitable to conceive of it as the support of the conception of burning and it is suitable to apprehend it as the related form of smoke.üîΩThis is what is said in the Pramii(laviirttikam) when it says:üîΩLikewise, although fire is different, it is the basis of the cognition of fire.

original: 'di skad du rnam 'grel las de bzhin du me tha dad kyang me shes pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du gzhan la ltos pa'i mer rtogs pa'i yan lag nyid las byung ba na /
analyzed: 'di skad du rnam 'grel las de bzhin du me tha dad kyang me shes pa'i rten yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du gzhan la ltos pa'i mer rtogs pa'i yan lag nyid las byung ba na /
translated: And likewise, when it arises from the mere fact of being a part of the cognition of fire that depends on another,

original: du ba de la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: du ba de la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: there is no error in that smoke.

original: 'bras bur gyur pa de bzhin du gzhan yang ma yin no zhe na'o //
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa de bzhin du gzhan yang ma yin no zhe na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that the result is like that in other cases.

original: don 'di nyid smos pa ni gal te brgya byi na spyi bo me nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: don 'di nyid smos pa ni gal te brgya byi na spyi bo me nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa ste /
translated: This very point is stated in the following: If it is argued that the head of a peacock is the nature of fire,

original: mes bskyed par bya ba'i du ba skyed pa yin na ni de nyid me yin te /
analyzed: mes bskyed par bya ba'i du ba skyed pa yin na ni de nyid me yin te /
translated: If it generates smoke that is generated by fire, then it is fire itself,

original: me'i bskyed par bya ba skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me'i bskyed par bya ba skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it generates the product of fire.

original: 'on te me'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ma yin na ni ji ltar ni gzhi de las du ba 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: 'on te me'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ma yin na ni ji ltar ni gzhi de las du ba 'byung ba yin /
translated: But if it is not the nature of fire, then how does smoke arise from that basis?

original: ci'i phyir me'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las du ba mi 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir me'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las du ba mi 'byung zhe na /
translated: Why does smoke not arise from what is not the nature of fire?

original: bshad pa / du ba rgya'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / du ba rgya'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is said: The nature of smoke is that which is generated from it,

original: de las skye ba'i phyir de'i nus pa ste /
analyzed: de las skye ba'i phyir de'i nus pa ste /
translated: because it is generated from that.

original: du bskyed par byed pa'i @261a * //
analyzed: du bskyed par byed pa'i @261a * //
translated: The capacity to generate smoke

original: nus pa nyid kyis dngos po gzhan dag las bye brag tu ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: nus pa nyid kyis dngos po gzhan dag las bye brag tu ldan pa yin te /
translated: is a distinct property of other things.üîΩThe capacity to generate smoke is a distinct property of other things, because it is a distinct property of other things that are not the generator.

original: skyed par byed pa nyid kyis ltos par bya ba ma yin pa gzhan dag las tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa nyid kyis ltos par bya ba ma yin pa gzhan dag las tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is distinct from other things that are not to be relied upon because it is the generator.

original: da ni du ba gzhan las 'byung na ni du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa las skyes par 'gyur la /
analyzed: da ni du ba gzhan las 'byung na ni du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa las skyes par 'gyur la /
translated: Now, if smoke arises from another, it would arise from what is not the cause of smoke.

original: du ba du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa las byung bar rtogs pa na mtha' dag gi sna tshogs rgyu med ba can du 'gyur ba'i phyir de yang rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du ba du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa las byung bar rtogs pa na mtha' dag gi sna tshogs rgyu med ba can du 'gyur ba'i phyir de yang rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
translated: When one understands that smoke arises from what is not the cause of smoke, then everything would be without a cause, and that also would be without a cause.

original: da ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu tha dad ba las 'bras bu tha dad par khas blangs pa na'o //
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu tha dad ba las 'bras bu tha dad par khas blangs pa na'o //
translated: Now, if one accepts that the effect is different from the different causes,üîΩfrom the different co-operators,

original: lhan cig byed pa tha dad pa las zhes bya ba ni rigs kyis gcig gi tshig yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa tha dad pa las zhes bya ba ni rigs kyis gcig gi tshig yin te /
translated: the word ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù is a class by itself.

original: lhan cig byed par tha dad pa rnams las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lhan cig byed par tha dad pa rnams las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: from the different co-operators.

original: de nyid ston pa ni dper na mig dang gzugs la sogs pa dag las shes par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni dper na mig dang gzugs la sogs pa dag las shes par bya ba yin te /
translated: To show just that, he says, for example, from eye and form, etc., there is consciousness.

original: sogs pa smos pas snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes light and attention, etc.

original: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To refute that, he says,

original: dngos po gcig bu skyed par byed pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po gcig bu skyed par byed pa ste /
translated: it is the producer of the single entity,

original: byed pa po'i bya ba dang ldan pa'am /
analyzed: byed pa po'i bya ba dang ldan pa'am /
translated: endowed with the activity of the agent,

original: de'i rang bzhin te skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin te skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: But there is no intrinsic reality of that which is the nature of the generator.

original: 'on khyed kyi skyed par byed par 'dod pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on khyed kyi skyed par byed par 'dod pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it that you assert to be the generator?

original: bshad pa / tshogs pa skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: bshad pa / tshogs pa skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: We respond: The assembly is the generator.

original: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yang de nyid yin no //üîΩji ltar na skyed par byed pa nyid las /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yang de nyid yin no // ji ltar na skyed par byed pa nyid las /
translated: And that is the intrinsic reality of the generator.

original: de'i rang bzhin logs shig tu brjod de /üîΩgang gi phyir gang zhig skyed par byed pa'i dngos po de nyid ni de'i rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin logs shig tu brjod de / gang gi phyir gang zhig skyed par byed pa'i dngos po de nyid ni de'i rang bzhin yin te /
translated: How is it that the intrinsic reality of the generator is stated separately from the generator itself?üîΩBecause that very thing which is the generator is the intrinsic reality of that.

original: skyed par byed pa ma yin pa yang de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ma yin pa yang de'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If that which is not the generator were the intrinsic reality of that, it would follow that anything could be anything.

original: bden te / skad cig ma ma yin par smra ba ni lhan cig byed pa so so bdag skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang /
analyzed: bden te / skad cig ma ma yin par smra ba ni lhan cig byed pa so so bdag skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang /
translated: It is true that for those who assert that things are not momentary, the individual intrinsic nature of the co-arisen is the generator.

original: skyed par byed pa ni tshogs pa yin par 'dod la /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ni tshogs pa yin par 'dod la /
translated: But the generator is asserted to be the assembly.

original: de yang kho bo cag ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: de yang kho bo cag ni mi 'dod de /
translated: We do not assert that.

original: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig skyed par byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig skyed par byed pa ma yin na /
translated: Because it does not produce anything,

original: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no //
translated: it does not have the nature of a producer.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu mthong ba las de 'dra ba'i tshogs pa rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no //üîΩdon du gnyer ba nyid kyis ni tshogs pa'i khongs su gtogs pa gcig rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu mthong ba las de 'dra ba'i tshogs pa rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no // don du gnyer ba nyid kyis ni tshogs pa'i khongs su gtogs pa gcig rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the collection of causes and conditions is inferred from the effect that is seen.üîΩBut if the effect is not seen, the collection is inferred from the desire for the effect.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa mang po rnams gcig gi skyed par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa mang po rnams gcig gi skyed par byed pa yin na /
translated: If many eyes, etc. produce one effect,

original: ji ltar rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par @261b 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par @261b 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: how can the effect be different from the cause?

original: de dag so sor nus par yang ji ltar brjod de /
analyzed: de dag so sor nus par yang ji ltar brjod de /
translated: Or how can it be said that each of the many eyes, etc. is capable of producing the effect?

original: skad cig gi 'og rol gyi bum pa tshogs pa bskyed par yang gang gis 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: skad cig gi 'og rol gyi bum pa tshogs pa bskyed par yang gang gis 'gyur zhe na /
translated: And how can the collection of many eyes, etc. produce a second effect after the first?

original: tshogs pa de nyid ces smos te /
analyzed: tshogs pa de nyid ces smos te /
translated: The response is that the collection itself is the cause of the effect.

original: de dag las rgyun 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par so sor 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de dag las rgyun 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par so sor 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The effect is different from the collection because the effect arises from the continuum of the collection.

original: des na so sor nus pa dang tha dad par byad pa nyid yin zhing /
analyzed: des na so sor nus pa dang tha dad par byad pa nyid yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the compound is that the collection generates the effect because it is the cause of the effect, it is the cause of the continuation of the effect, and it is the cause of the difference of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect because it is the cause of the persistence of the effect.

original: rgyun 'phel ba'i phyir skyed par byed pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgyun 'phel ba'i phyir skyed par byed pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: The collection that generates is the cause of the difference of the effect because it is the cause of the transformation of the effect.

original: skyed par byed pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de nyid ni /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de nyid ni /
translated: The collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect because it is the cause of the persistence of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the difference of the effect because it is the cause of the transformation of the effect.

original: 'bras bu rang gi ngo bo de'i gnas pa de'i rten yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu rang gi ngo bo de'i gnas pa de'i rten yin no //
translated: The collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect because it is the cause of the persistence of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the difference of the effect because it is the cause of the transformation of the effect.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i gang dag las 'bras bu de skyes pa de dag las de'i khyad par so sor 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i gang dag las 'bras bu de skyes pa de dag las de'i khyad par so sor 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: The collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect because it is the cause of the persistence of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the difference of the effect because it is the cause of the transformation of the effect.

original: de dag gis ni de'i rgyu can ma yin pa dag las 'bras bu de tha dad par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni de'i rgyu can ma yin pa dag las 'bras bu de tha dad par byed pa yin no //
translated: The collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect because it is the cause of the persistence of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the difference of the effect because it is the cause of the transformation of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect because it is the cause of the persistence of the effect.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las 'bras bu de 'bras bu gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu ni lhan cig byed pa dag yin gyi /üîΩgcig nyid ni rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las 'bras bu de 'bras bu gzhan dag las tha dad pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par gnas pa'i rgyu ni lhan cig byed pa dag yin gyi /üîΩgcig nyid ni rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: The collection that generates is the cause of the difference of the effect because it is the cause of the transformation of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the effect because it is the cause of the effect.üîΩThe collection that generates is the cause of the continuation of the effect

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa ni rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i rten du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa ni rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i rten du brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the collection is said to be the basis for the existence of its own nature.

original: 'di ni 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu du ma las 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu du ma las 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe effect is different from the different causes‚Äù does not mean that the effect does not arise from many causes.

original: 'on kyang rgyu rigs mi 'dra ba las 'bras bu yang 'bras bu gzhan dang rigs mi 'dra ba 'byung ba'i phyir tha dad pa'i don rigs mi 'dra ba'i don yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu rigs mi 'dra ba las 'bras bu yang 'bras bu gzhan dang rigs mi 'dra ba 'byung ba'i phyir tha dad pa'i don rigs mi 'dra ba'i don yin gyi /
translated: However, because the effect arises from causes of different types, the effect is of a different type from other effects. Therefore, the meaning of ‚Äúdifferent‚Äù is ‚Äúof a different type,‚Äù

original: du ma'i don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ma'i don ni ma yin no //
translated: not ‚Äúmany.‚Äù

original: de lta ma yin na mngon sum dang 'gal bar brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mngon sum dang 'gal bar brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: If that were not so, it would be said that this contradicts direct perception,

original: tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa las 'bras bu skye bar mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect is seen to arise from the collection.

original: ji ltar na rdzas gcig las tha mi dad pa'i khyad par rgyu tha dad pas byas par rtogs she na /
analyzed: ji ltar na rdzas gcig las tha mi dad pa'i khyad par rgyu tha dad pas byas par rtogs she na /
translated: How is it understood that the difference that is not different from a single substance is produced by different causes?

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las te /
translated: It is understood from positive and negative concomitance.

original: ma rtogs pa las bzlog pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid las yin gyi /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa las bzlog pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nyid las yin gyi /
translated: The opposite of non-comprehension is the condition as equivalent and immediate antecedent.

original: yul dang dbang po dag las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dag las ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not from the object and the sense faculty,

original: de dag gi byed pa med kyang rnam par shes pa gzhan rtogs par mthong ba'i phyir dang / byed pa yod kyang de dag gis nye bar len pa dag las mig dang yul gyi skad cig dag rtogs pa med par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi byed pa med kyang rnam par shes pa gzhan rtogs par mthong ba'i phyir dang / byed pa yod kyang de dag gis nye bar len pa dag las mig dang yul gyi skad cig dag rtogs pa med par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, even though the activity of the latter is absent, one sees that consciousness is produced from another, and even though the activity of the former is present, one sees that the eye and the object are not the cause of the production of the consciousness that appropriates them.

original: yul gyi rnam pa ni yul nyid las yin te /üîΩmig dang yid dag gi byed pa @262a * //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa ni yul nyid las yin te / mig dang yid dag gi byed pa @262a * //
translated: The aspect of the object is from the object itself,

original: yod kyang / nges pa'i rnam pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod kyang / nges pa'i rnam pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, even though the activity of the eye and the mental faculty is present, one does not see the aspect of the object.

original: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las bum pa la rdza mkhan la sogs pa rnams bdag nyid kyi khyad par dag la byed par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las bum pa la rdza mkhan la sogs pa rnams bdag nyid kyi khyad par dag la byed par sbyar ro //
translated: In the same way, one should apply the activity of the potter, etc., to the pot, etc., from the point of view of concomitance and nonconcomitance.

original: ji ltar yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni skad cig gcig gi yul can ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni skad cig gcig gi yul can ma yin te /
translated: The relation of cause and effect is not the object of a single moment.

original: de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las nges par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las nges par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is to be ascertained by the concomitance and the reverse concomitance.

original: skad cig gcig ni rgyur mngon par 'dod pa'i skad cig 'ba' zhig med na med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skad cig gcig ni rgyur mngon par 'dod pa'i skad cig 'ba' zhig med na med pa ma yin te /
translated: The momentariness is not ascertained as the effect, because the effect does not exist without the cause that is accepted as the cause of the momentariness,

original: khams gsum la med na yang med pa'i phyir thams cad kyis thams cad kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khams gsum la med na yang med pa'i phyir thams cad kyis thams cad kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: but it is not the case that it does not exist without the cause that is accepted as the cause of the momentariness, because it does not exist in the three realms.

original: yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa dang / tshu rol mthong ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir skad cig ni 'bras bu nyid du nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa dang / tshu rol mthong ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir skad cig ni 'bras bu nyid du nges pa ma yin no //
translated: The momentariness is not ascertained as the effect because it does not follow the existence and nonexistence of the effect and because it is not the object of the perception of this shore.

original: me'i rnam par 'dzin pa skyed par rung ba tsam nyid kyi du ba'i rnam par 'dzin pa tsam du rung ba'i skyed par byed pa nyid du nges par yin la /
analyzed: me'i rnam par 'dzin pa skyed par rung ba tsam nyid kyi du ba'i rnam par 'dzin pa tsam du rung ba'i skyed par byed pa nyid du nges par yin la /
translated: The production of the apprehension of smoke is ascertained as the cause of the production of the apprehension of fire, because it is suitable to produce the apprehension of smoke, which is suitable to produce the apprehension of fire.

original: de lta bur gyur ba yang gcig ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por nges pa ni tshogs pa'i yul na yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur ba yang gcig ma yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por nges pa ni tshogs pa'i yul na yin no //
translated: And that is ascertained as the relation of cause and effect in the domain of the collection, because it is not one.

original: tshogs pa can dag las tha dad pa'i tshogs pa gcig dngos por med kyang /
analyzed: tshogs pa can dag las tha dad pa'i tshogs pa gcig dngos por med kyang /
translated: Although the collection is not a thing that is different from the things in the collection,

original: du ma yang med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: du ma yang med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: it is not the case that there is no multiplicity.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For, otherwise, there would be an absurd consequence.

original: de bzhin du dngos po du ma'i yul can nyid kyi khyad par ni lhan cig byed pa la ltos te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po du ma'i yul can nyid kyi khyad par ni lhan cig byed pa la ltos te /
translated: In the same way, the distinction of having many things as its object depends on the collection of cooperating causes.

original: so sor tha dad pa yin gyi skad cig gcig gi yul can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor tha dad pa yin gyi skad cig gcig gi yul can ni ma yin no //
translated: The distinction is that of individual things, not that of a single moment.

original: des na tshogs pa ni 'bras bu khyad par can gyi rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i rten yin no //
analyzed: des na tshogs pa ni 'bras bu khyad par can gyi rang gi ngo bo gnas pa'i rten yin no //
translated: Therefore, the collection is the basis for the existence of the specific effect.

original: 'o na ji ltar na tshogs pa rnams so sor nus par brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar na tshogs pa rnams so sor nus par brjod ce na /
translated: But how can the collection be said to have individual power?

original: gang gi phyir 'dus pa gzhan med pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi skyed par thal ba de'i phyir tshogs pa rnams so sor nus pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dus pa gzhan med pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi skyed par thal ba de'i phyir tshogs pa rnams so sor nus pa yin no //
translated: Because it is not the case that the collection does not produce the effect when the other conditions are not present, the collection is said to have individual power.

original: gang gi phyir don gyi dngos po skyed pa'i tshogs ba rnam par gnas pa'i rten du gyur pa yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don gyi dngos po skyed pa'i tshogs ba rnam par gnas pa'i rten du gyur pa yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the collection is the basis for the existence of the specific effect,

original: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang rnam grangs med par te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyang rnam grangs med par te /
translated: and the cooperating causes produce it without distinction,

original: rim pa ma yin pa dang so sor ma yin par skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rim pa ma yin pa dang so sor ma yin par skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: not in stages and not individually.

original: gal te tha dad pa dag kyang skyed par byed pa nyid yin na ni de'i tshe so sor dus tha dad du nus pas /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa dag kyang skyed par byed pa nyid yin na ni de'i tshe so sor dus tha dad du nus pas /
translated: If they are different and they are producers, then at that time, each having the power at a different time,

original: rim gyis 'bras bu skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rim gyis 'bras bu skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: they would produce the effect in stages.

original: gang gi tshe tshogs pas 'bras bu khyad par can gcig skyed par nus pa de'i tshe ni rnam grangs med cing so so ma yin par skyed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshogs pas 'bras bu khyad par can gcig skyed par nus pa de'i tshe ni rnam grangs med cing so so ma yin par skyed pa yin no //
translated: But when the collection is able to produce a single special effect, then it is produced without distinction and not individually.

original: 'bras bu gcig @262b du ma las rang bzhin gyi khyad par 'grub pa ni lhan cig byed pa yod pa'i phyir so so tha dad par skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig @262b du ma las rang bzhin gyi khyad par 'grub pa ni lhan cig byed pa yod pa'i phyir so so tha dad par skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The establishment of a special nature from a single effect is not produced individually, because the cooperating causes exist.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las mi skye'o zhes ji ltar brjod de /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las mi skye'o zhes ji ltar brjod de /
translated: How can it be said that it is not produced from a dissimilar type?

original: gang gi phyir gci ba la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa las kyang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gci ba la sogs pa rigs mi mthun pa las kyang /
translated: Because even from a dissimilar type, such as urine,

original: autpala la sogs pa 'byung bar mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: autpala la sogs pa 'byung bar mthong ba yin no //
translated: For example, we see that lotuses and so on arise from seeds of the same type.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gang zhig 'bras bu gang gi rgyu'i dngos por mthong ba de ni rigs mthun pa'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gang zhig 'bras bu gang gi rgyu'i dngos por mthong ba de ni rigs mthun pa'i rgyu yin la /
translated: From the perspective of positive and negative concomitance, whatever is seen to be the cause of a particular effect is a homogeneous cause of that effect.

original: de las tha dad ba ni rigs mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de las tha dad ba ni rigs mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: Whatever is different from that is a heterogeneous cause.

original: de bzhin du autpala la sogs pa yang mthong ba'i rgyu las gzhan las skye ba de des na rigs mi mthun pa las skye ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du autpala la sogs pa yang mthong ba'i rgyu las gzhan las skye ba de des na rigs mi mthun pa las skye ba yin no zhe na /
translated: In the same way, lotuses and so on are seen to arise from causes other than themselves, so they arise from heterogeneous causes.

original: lan bshad pa /
analyzed: lan bshad pa /
translated: The response to that is as follows.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las skye bar mthong ba de la yang /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las skye bar mthong ba de la yang /
translated: Even though we see that lotuses and so on arise from heterogeneous causes,

original: autpala zhes de skad brjod kyang ste /
analyzed: autpala zhes de skad brjod kyang ste /
translated: we say ‚Äúlotus‚Äù and so on.

original: sgra mtshungs pas brjod par bya ba yin pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
analyzed: sgra mtshungs pas brjod par bya ba yin pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
translated: This is because they are expressed by the same term.

original: autpala gang la rang gi sa bon las rab tu skye ba yod pa de las autpala cig shos gci ba las byung ba ni rnam pa dang dbyibs dang 'bras bu la sogs pas mtshon pa'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: autpala gang la rang gi sa bon las rab tu skye ba yod pa de las autpala cig shos gci ba las byung ba ni rnam pa dang dbyibs dang 'bras bu la sogs pas mtshon pa'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: The lotus that arises from its own seed is different in nature from the other lotus that arises from urine, as indicated by its form, shape, fruit, etc.

original: tha dad pa yang gang zhe na /üîΩrgyu'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
analyzed: tha dad pa yang gang zhe na / rgyu'i rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes smos so //
translated: What is different?üîΩIt is said that it is different because of the difference in the nature of its cause.

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe'i thabs kyis gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni dpe'i thabs kyis gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: For example,

original: / sa bon dang sdong bu dag las skye ba'i chu shing gang yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: / sa bon dang sdong bu dag las skye ba'i chu shing gang yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: the plantain tree that arises from a seed and a stem.

original: sa bon las skye ba'i chu shing ni 'bras bu med pa yin la /
analyzed: sa bon las skye ba'i chu shing ni 'bras bu med pa yin la /
translated: The plantain tree that arises from a seed is fruitless,

original: sdong bu las skye ba'i ni 'bras bu can yin te /
analyzed: sdong bu las skye ba'i ni 'bras bu can yin te /
translated: while the one that arises from a stem is fruitful.

original: des na de dag ni 'bras bu dang 'brel pa dang ma 'brel pa dag gis tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de dag ni 'bras bu dang 'brel pa dang ma 'brel pa dag gis tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, they are different because of being related and not related to fruit.

original: rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo nas kyang tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo nas kyang tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, they are taught to be different in terms of their different aspects.

original: de lta bu ni 'jig rten na gsal ba kho nar rnam par 'byed do zhes smos te /üîΩsdong bu las skyes pa'i chu shing ni sbom pa dang sngo ba'i rnam pa can yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu ni 'jig rten na gsal ba kho nar rnam par 'byed do zhes smos te / sdong bu las skyes pa'i chu shing ni sbom pa dang sngo ba'i rnam pa can yin la /
translated: Thus, in the world, it is clearly distinguished.üîΩA banana tree that arises from a trunk has a thick, green aspect.

original: sa bon las skyes pa'i chu shing ni shun lpags skya ba dang sdong bu phra ba yin no //üîΩde lta na yang sdong bu las skyes pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sa bon las skyes pa'i chu shing ni shun lpags skya ba dang sdong bu phra ba yin no // de lta na yang sdong bu las skyes pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: A banana tree that arises from a seed has a pale bark and a thin trunk.

original: sa bon las byung ba'i sdong bu las skyes pa dang / sdong bu las byung ba'i sdong bu las skyes pa yin la /
analyzed: sa bon las byung ba'i sdong bu las skyes pa dang / sdong bu las byung ba'i sdong bu las skyes pa yin la /
translated: Even so, that which arises from a trunk is of two types: that which arises from a trunk that arose from a seed and that which arises from a trunk that arose from a trunk.

original: de dag kyang gzugs khyad par med pa'i phyir de dag las bar du chod pa'i sa bon dpog pa na 'khrul par 'gyur ba zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gzugs khyad par med pa'i phyir de dag las bar du chod pa'i sa bon dpog pa na 'khrul par 'gyur ba zhe na /
translated: Since their forms are not different, if one infers the seed that is obstructed by them, one will be mistaken.

original: 'di la lan gdab pa'i phyir bshad @263a * //
analyzed: 'di la lan gdab pa'i phyir bshad @263a * //
translated: To respond to this, it is explained.

original: pa ; bar du chod pa'i rgyu rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ni 'bras bu 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pa ; bar du chod pa'i rgyu rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ni 'bras bu 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: The effect does not occur because of the inference of an interrupted cause.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: de ma thag pa'i rgyu nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rgyu nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no //
translated: The cause is inferred to be immediate.

original: bar du ma chod pa'i rgyu de ni 'bras bu'i rdzas 'dra ba rnams la 'dra ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: bar du ma chod pa'i rgyu de ni 'bras bu'i rdzas 'dra ba rnams la 'dra ba nyid yin no //
translated: The cause that is not interrupted is similar to the substance of the effect.

original: de la ni rjes su dpog pa 'khrul pa med la /
analyzed: de la ni rjes su dpog pa 'khrul pa med la /
translated: There is no error in the inference of that.

original: bar du chod pa'i rgyu ni rjes su dpog par ma yin pas 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: bar du chod pa'i rgyu ni rjes su dpog par ma yin pas 'khrul pa med do //
translated: There is no error in the inference of an interrupted cause.

original: dper na rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun du rjes su 'jug pa'i chu shing gzugs khyad par med pa sdong bu gcig las skyes pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni rgyun du rjes su 'jug pa'i chu shing gzugs khyad par med pa sdong bu gcig las skyes pa dag bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a continuous connection, like a plantain tree. The forms that arise from a single stem are indistinguishable.

original: 'bras bu gang la dngos kyi skyed par byed pa'i rgyu tha dad pa de la ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu gang la dngos kyi skyed par byed pa'i rgyu tha dad pa de la ni 'bras bu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa yang yod pa yin te /
translated: For an effect that has a different generative cause, there is also a difference in the nature of the effect.

original: dper na gang dag sa bon dang sdong bu las skye ba can gyis chu shing de dag nyid yin no //
analyzed: dper na gang dag sa bon dang sdong bu las skye ba can gyis chu shing de dag nyid yin no //
translated: For example, the plantain tree is that which arises from a seed and a stem.

original: des na rgyu gang las 'bras bu ci 'dra ba dngos su skye bar mthong ba'i 'bras bu de 'dra ba de las ni de ma thag pa'i rgyu de 'dra ba nyid rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rgyu gang las 'bras bu ci 'dra ba dngos su skye bar mthong ba'i 'bras bu de 'dra ba de las ni de ma thag pa'i rgyu de 'dra ba nyid rjes su dpog pa yin no //
